about_the_game:
Incredible Creatures

We turned the tables on creature creation by beginning with artists instead of writers. This book includes 32 pieces of original creature art which a small army of writers then used as inspiration for nearly 140 brand new creatures ready for your fifth edition game! Inside, you'll also find:
  • 6 lairs with full-color maps
  • a number of magic items
  • a full d100 wild magic table
  • and even a warlock patron!
